dcterms:creator: A. Sironi
M. Delbruck
R. Etienne-Cummings
T. Delbruck
dcterms:description: The NCARS dataset contains around 24K samples of event-based automotive data, each having a length of 100ms. The samples encode spatial coordinates, timestamps, and polarity of brightness variations, and are split into training and testing sets for car and background classes.
dcterms:title: NCARS dataset
